mapper.select: SELECT image_url FROM lt_certificate WHERE id = #{certificateId}

SELECT ltc.id,ltc.user_id,ltu.nickname,ltc.course_id,ltc.`status`, course.course_name,course.certificate_image_url FROM lt_certificate AS ltc LEFT JOIN lt_user AS ltu ON ltc.user_id=ltu.id LEFT JOIN lt_course AS `course` ON ltc.course_id=course.id WHERE ltc.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT lt_user.nickname as nickname ,lt_course.course_name as courseName,lt_course.certificate_image_url as imageUrl,lt_certificate.id as id,lt_certificate.user_id as userId,lt_certificate.course_id as courseId,lt_certificate.status as status FROM lt_certificate,lt_course,lt_user WHERE lt_certificate.user_id = lt_user.id AND lt_certificate.course_id = lt_course.id AND lt_certificate.user_id =#{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT le.id, le.language_name as `name` FROM lt_order der LEFT JOIN lt_order_courses ses ON ses.order_id = der.id LEFT JOIN lt_course cour ON ses.courses_id=cour.id LEFT JOIN lt_language le ON le.id = cour.language_id WHERE cour.certificate_or_not ='yes' AND der.user_id =#{userId}
SELECT id as courseId ,course_name as courseName , certificate_intro as `describe` , certificate_image_url as certificateIimage FROM `lt_course` WHERE language_id = #{id} AND status ='putaway'
SELECT id as levelId , level_name as levelName FROM `lt_level` WHERE course_id = #{id} AND status ='putaway'
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `lt_chapter` WHERE `status`='putaway' AND level_id=#{id}
SELECT course_name FROM `lt_course` WHERE language_id = #{id} AND status ='putaway' limit 0,1
